entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5 except plus 1 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 5 except plus 1 in onshore winds. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming north 20 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
